paragraphs.text: Yeah, but these people have no idea what they’re protesting against. Modern protests are based on lies (BLM) or hypocritical ignorance (anti-fa).

paragraphs.text: I feel you on this.When we love deeply, we will fight for what is right and true. Love is long lasting, so there must be trust developed to keep it going. Love for a country, is ensuring you resist all that can destroy it’s existence. Resistance comes with the realisation that what is there will contaminate the present and future. So yes, when you…

Resistance vs riots. Seems too many of you romanticize the hatred and vitriol that comes from “your” side while condemning the “other” side with the worst rhetoric possible. Hatred stems from the heart too and it is unnecessary here.
paragraphs.name: 62e0

38cc66d8bb80.title: St. Augustine recognized that the essence of evil is disordered love.

paragraphs.text: St. Augustine recognized that the essence of evil is disordered love. I love having my own way over justice; I love potato chips over health; I love venting my emotions over restraint; I love my opinions over facts and truth. Many romances are characterized by violent emotions, lovers’ quarrels leading to domestic abuse and abortion. The Left’s…

f9c812ef203dcc5622cde572543c882a.description: Resistance starts in your heart. When you turn on your phone, or the news, when you open the paper to take in the President's daily assault on compassion, reason and basic good sense, the fear and rage feels like nothing so much as a fist closing around your heart.
